channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Senate Democrats Just Voted For Wasting Your Tax Dollars On NPR, Newsom’s ‘Train To Nowhere’
item.description: Every single Senate Democrat who wasn't hospitalized and two Never-Trump Republicans voted to keep PBS's and NPR's grotesque and absurd content flowin...

item.title: House clears $9 billion DOGE spending cut package, sending bill to Trump for signature
item.description: Congress cleared a $9 billion package of spending cuts to foreign aid and public broadcasting for President Trump's signature, codifying a small porti...

item.title: Trump says salacious Epstein letter attributed to him is 'fake,' and plans lawsuit against WSJ
item.description: President Trump lashed out Thursday at the Wall Street Journal for publishing a letter he supposedly sent to disgraced late financier Jeffrey Epstein,...

item.title: Trump reclassifies some federal workers, making them easier to fire

item.title: Schmitt celebrates Senate passage of $9 billion DOGE cuts as 'important step'
item.description: Sen. Eric Schmitt told the White House budget office back in January he wanted to help it cut wasteful spending using a rare procedure known as rescis...

item.title: Why Tariffs (Probably) Won’t Cause Inflation (But Still Raise Prices)
item.description: Not all bad economic policy is inflationary, and not causing inflation doesn’t make economic policy good.

item.title: Trump orders release of grand jury transcripts from Epstein case
item.description: President Trump said Thursday he has directed Attorney General Pam Bondi to release "any and all" relevant grand jury testimony in the case of decease...

item.title: The Quest to Hold Hamas Accountable for Sexual Violence
item.description: When and if terrorists now detained in Israel are prosecuted, they should be charged with sexual violence, authors of a new report advise.

item.title: Everything That’s Going On
item.description: Something has gone Deeply Wrong in the United States since November of last year.

item.title: Messy New Jersey Voter Rolls Have More Than 32,000 ‘Questionable’ Voter Records, Report Says
item.description: After reviewing New Jersey’s voter roll, PILF found an “urgent need for improved list maintenance practice.”

item.title: Republican Says Her Amnesty Bill Will Help Illegals Treat America Like A Piggy Bank Forever

item.title: The Alcaraz-Sinner Rivalry Is Kicking Off A New Generation Of Tennis Greats
item.description: The next golden age of men’s tennis is unfolding before our very eyes, and that should make everyone happy — including the pickleball players.

item.title: IVF Experiments That Mix And Match Multiple Adults’ DNA Are Bad For Kids And Society
item.description: Scientists are paving the way for people in polyamorous relationships to commission the creation of children with their DNA.

item.title: In Congress, Two Paths Emerge for Republicans on Immigration
item.description: Border security is a settled issue, but the questions of what to do with legal immigration and long-term illegal residents still divide the party.
